April 27, 2025 - Yummly was an American website and mobile app that provided users recipes via recommendations and a search engine. Yummly used a knowledge graph to offer a semantic web search engine for food, cooking and recipes. The company was founded by David Feller and Vadim Geshel in early 2008.
